description: Before sitting down at this restaurant, why not take a short stroll to the nearby viewpoint looking out towards Capri – a perfect prelude to the excellent home-cooked and authentic Campanian cuisine that awaits here. In fact, Capri-style ravioli is one of the most popular dishes at the restaurant, which also serves aubergine parmigiana (highly recommended), potato “gâteau”, and various fish options among the main courses.
